title: Rally Point (5U38)
text:
Set:	Battle of Helm's Deep
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a knight to transfer a [Gondor] fortification borne by a minion to your support area.
Lore:	A strategic fallback helps Gondorian knights to plan their counterattack.
Rarity:	U
